nodes.text: A blue skinned pirate of unidentified species who was part of the crew of pirate Captain Gir Kybo Ren-Cha.

After discovering C-3PO, who had infiltrated Kybo Ren's hideout on Tarnoonga, this pirate and his two companions were tackled by Jann Tosh, coming to the rescue of his droid. As the droid and his master fled, the angry pirate and his comrades pursued, but were unable to capture the fugitives.

This pirate appeared only in the book The Pirates of Tarnoonga: A Droid Adventure and was not present in the Pirates of Tarnoonga television episode.
The tattoo on the shoulder of the pirate is the emblem of the Pirates of Tarnoonga.
